Html:
Hi radioman

 

How can I cace an area of map (For example my city) ?

 

Regardds ,

use prefetcher integrated into demos, and copy database file from C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\GMap.NET\TileDBv3\en (by default)

p.s. cache is unlimited, you can browse maps until it grows upto 50GB if you really want ;}

and do not post double posts with different titles ;}
